title: Montenegro court cancels extradition approval for Do Kwon
description:
The Montenegro Appeals Court has thrown out a November decision by the country’s High Court that the legal conditions for the former Terra CEO's extradition had been met.

A court in Montenegro has canceled the extradition approval of Terra founder Do Kwon to either the United States or South Korea.

The Appellate Court of Montenegro on Dec. 14 ruled to annul the decision of the High Court of Podgorica approving Kwon’s extradition to either the U.S. or South Korea, according to an official announcement on Dec. 19.

The High Court of Podgorica previously determined the legal requirements for Kwon’s extradition in November 2023, leaving the final decision on Kwon’s extradition to Montenegro’s minister of justice.

Read more

title: Nigerian Crypto Exchange Describes Deposit Suspension as ‘Industry-Standard Precautionary Measure’
description: The Nigerian cryptocurrency exchange platform Bitmama recently said it has temporarily suspended deposits due to “ongoing third-party maintenance.” Bitmama said that while earlier media reports about its suspension of deposits are correct, they nevertheless “lack context,” and may have confused users. title: Circle launches EURC stablecoin on the Solana network
description: Circle, a prominent player in the stablecoin market, has recently announced the launch of its EURC stablecoin on the Solana blockchain. title: Ransomware Attack on Insomniac Leads to Massive Data Leak
description: In a recent cyberattack, renowned game developer Insomniac Games fell victim to a ransomware attack that has sent shockwaves through the gaming industry. title: Tri-National Alliance Deploys AI to Enhance Submarine Tracking in Asia Pacific
description: In a landmark move, the governments of Australia, the United Kingdom, and the United States have joined forces to deploy advanced artificial intelligence (AI) technology aimed at bolstering maritime security in the Asia Pacific region. title: Coinbase advances in Singapore with USD SWIFT transfers
description: Coinbase, a leading cryptocurrency exchange listed on Nasdaq, is making significant strides in Singapore by introducing United States Dollar (USD) transfers for retail customers. By utilizing the SWIFT network, this feature allows users to transfer USD to and from their accounts seamlessly. This development is crucial in bridging the gap between fiat and crypto, particularly […]

title: Iron Lung Developer Encourages Piracy Amidst Price Controversy
description: In a surprising turn of events, David Szymanski, the sole developer behind the 2022 submarine horror game “Iron Lung,” has stirred up controversy by encouraging players to pirate his game.  This unusual stance comes as a response to backlash from some players after the game’s price recently increased by $2 on the Steam platform. title: Pro-XRP Attorney John Deaton Earns Lawyer of the Year Recognition
description:

title: Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Whales Make Big Moves: To What End?
description:
